1. City Council

City Council

  • City Council Chambers 206 N. Murphy Road. Murphy, TX 75094

View meeting regulations for the City Council.

Individual City Council members may be contacted by following their name link below or the council may be emailed as a group . All Council Members are elected at-large and represent all Murphy Citizens.  The Place numbers are important for identifying the Council members.

  • Scott Bradley , Mayor
  • Elizabeth Abraham , Mayor Pro Tem , Place 1
  • Scott Smith , Council Member, Place 2
  • Andrew Chase , Council Member, Place 3
  • Ken Oltmann , Council Member, Place 4
  • Laura Deel , Council Member, Place 5
  • Jené Butler , Deputy Mayor Pro Tem, Place 6
